Comment: The thing is though, as a general public we simply don't want your products. So even if our government gives the go-ahead for chlorinated chicken, oversized rust-prone uneconomical cars or hormone treated beef (Etc), we're not going to buy it, because why would you when you can already have so much better?    America needs to bring it's standards up to Europes. If these trade deals get forced through without the standards being raised, I will actively avoid US products because I've seen 1st hand how unhealthy Americans are and (no offense) I don't want to become how the average American looks & feels, which is pretty  unhealthy.
